item.description:
This is planned way far out, but the reason for highlighting it now is that until Dec 1st, 30% can be taken off the price. After Dec 1st, the discount is still 25% for a while, so still worth doing.

With the 30% discount, it's down to a $419 and for that you get 60-mins in a real race car. Having done something similar up near Toronto, I can certainly say this is a great experience! That was cheaper, but this is much, much closer and won't involve as much travel costs!

To purchase at the discounted rate, follow these instructions:

TO RESERVE YOUR SEAT
Promotional pricing is not available through online registration. To reserve your seat in a program at the discounted rate please call 866.227.2375, Monday through Thursday from 8:00 am to 7:00 pm Eastern, and Friday from 8:00 am to 5:30 pm Eastern.

Details of the course itself here:

http://www.skipbarber...

And details about the track here:

http://www.skipbarber...

You need to be able to drive a manual in order to participate.

On May 20th, a 8:00AM and 9:30AM session are available.

Everyone will be responsible for own travel arrangements, though if there is enough interest, we can certainly consider car pooling and splitting the cost of gas, etc.
item.name: Intro to Racing - Lime Rock Park, CT - Real Race Cars!
